name: Escaping Harvest
description:
Hansel and Gretel: Escaping Harvest
by owenburgerman + marylikesgames

Free food is sus, and talking skulls dole out clues.

In this RPG Maker retelling of a children's classic,
you must save your brother from being someone's harvest.

=======================================

Submission to https://itch.io/jam/16-day-rpg-maker-themed-game-jam-4
Theme: Harvest
